text: Nancy Lee Milford (née Winston; March 26, 1938 – March 29, 2022) was an American biographer, who was noted for her biographies on Zelda Fitzgerald and Edna St. Vincent Millay. She died on March 29, 2022, three days after her 84th birthday. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American biographers Category:Writers from Michigan
title: Nancy Milford
